channel.title: about on Marium Tapal

item.title: about
item.description: Hi, I’m Marium Tapal! I study Statistical and Data Sciences (SDS) & Mathematics at Smith College with an expected graduation date in May 2022. I am passionate about learning new data science tools and technologies and solving complicated mathematical equations. I am an #rstats enthusiast - where I use it for most things in-and-out of school. I am the maintainer of the fec16 R package (hosted on CRAN). I am also a contributor to the fivethirtyeight R package and the ModernDive book and package.
